title: BREAKING! Voyager 1 "Stuck" Not Sending Data Home, Engineers Working Glitch
summary: NASA engineers are working to address a technical issue on Voyager 1, one of the agency's iconic deep space probes, as it encounters communication challenges between its onboard computers.

title: Helicity Space Secures $5M in Funding for Fusion Engines Development
summary: California-based startup Helicity Space, who are focused on developing fusion engines for spaceflight, have successfully raised $5 million in a seed funding round. The funding was secured from a consortium of investors, including Airbus Ventures, TRE Ventures, Voyager Space Holdings, E2MC Space, Urania Ventures, and Gaingels.

title: True Anomaly raises $100 million to expand investments in space security technologies
summary: True Anomaly, a startup based in Denver, announced Dec. 12 it has raised $100 million in a Series B funding round.

title: Blue Origin to resume New Shepard suborbital launches
summary: Blue Origin has announced plans to launch its New Shepard suborbital vehicle on its first flight since a mishap more than 15 months ago.

title: Armada Raises Over $55M For Portable Starlink Connected Data Centers
summary: Armada, a one-year-old data networking startup has raised more than $55 million in funding, to propel the development of its cutting-edge computing tools; designed to empower remote devices connected to Starlink, SpaceX's low Earth orbit broadband constellation.
